general_urban_bookish: If you see me reading—mind your business.
I came for the vibe. Stayed for the drama.
I read like I mean it.
My hobby? Plot twists and boundaries.
If you see me quiet, I’m reading.
I came to read, not to chat.
Catch me in my fictional era.
I romanticize my life with fiction.
This chapter has me in a chokehold.
If I’m smiling, the book is dangerous.
dark_romance: Morally gray is my favorite color.
He’s a problem. I’m the author.
If he wanted to, he would… and he DID.
Morally gray is my comfort color.
I like my romance dark and my boundaries respected.
Fictional red flags are my favorite genre.
I came for the plot… stayed for the obsession.
He’s the problem and I’m the reader.
If the tension doesn’t snap, I don’t want it.
I like my love stories ruthless.
He said mine—and my soul agreed.
This is not a love story. It’s a takeover.
paranormal: I like my romance cursed and committed.
The supernatural has nothing on my standards.
If it has fangs, I’m sold.
I like my romance a little haunted.
Magic, mayhem, and a man obsessed.
If he’s immortal, he better be loyal.
The paranormal isn’t scary—being single is.
Hexes, heat, and happily ever after.
If the bond snaps, so do I.
thriller: Trust issues but make it literary.
I knew it. I just needed the chapter to prove it.
If it’s calm… it’s a setup.
Trust no one. Turn the page.
I like my stories sharp and suspicious.
Nothing is what it seems—and I love it.
Give me chills, not small talk.
I read with my guard up.
If it’s peaceful, it’s a setup.
The clue is in chapter three.
I love a slow burn… into chaos.
Page-turner with a side of paranoia.
If it’s too quiet, someone’s lying.
soft_life_self_care: I protect my energy like it’s luxury.
Being gentle with myself is the plan.
I’m allowed to take up space and time.
My life is not an emergency.
iykyk: The girls that get it, get it.
This is a safe space for delulu.
I like my men fictional and unhinged.
I’m not okay and I love it here.
He smirked and I started a new personality.
I fear I have a type.
I’m in too deep (and so is he).
mood_quotes: If you need me, you don’t.
Quiet because the plot is plotting.
I’m not dramatic, the book is.
I said I was done. I lied.
I’m in my villain reader era.
If I’m quiet, it’s getting good.
bde_energy: He walk in like the block paid rent to him.
He stand there and women forget how to breathe.
That ‘come here’ without saying it energy.
He don’t prove nothing. He just is.
Energy so big it shift the atmosphere.
He don’t need attention. He commands it.
elite_dominance_lane: He’s rich, rude, and ridiculously obsessed.
If he wanted to, he funded it.
He buys companies and steals hearts.
If it's not exclusive, he’s not interested.
He solves problems with wire transfers.
Rich in assets. Poor in patience.
Old money calm. New money hunger.
Control issues but make it luxury.
He’s the villain and the reward.
He protects what’s his—quietly or loudly.
If he said mine, it’s documented.
urban_power_couple: Ride or die, but make it coordinated.
If trouble pull up, we handle it—together.
Built for pressure. Both of us.
We don’t do messy. We do strategic.
If it’s war, we show up matching.
He stands behind me. I stand beside him.
We don’t argue in public. We execute in private.
If it’s on the line, we’re the ones holding it down.
We protect each other like it’s policy.
Together we’re a problem… for everybody else.
boss_woman_energy: I’m the boss and the plot.
My standards have a security system.
I lead with confidence and receipts.
I’m not intimidating. You’re just unsure.
I don’t compete. I collect wins.
If I want it, it’s handled.
I’m the main character AND the director.
girly_feminine_energy: Soft, spoiled, and still in control.
If it doesn’t feel feminine and funded, I don’t want it.
I’m in my soft-girl era with grown-woman standards.
I like my books spicy and my life gentle.
Bow on the outside, backbone on the inside.
If it’s not tender, it’s not mine.
My life is pink-coded and protected.
Romance me correctly or move around.

M: If I claim it, it’s already secured.
Stay close. I don’t repeat myself.
Relax. Everything around you is protected.
You look expensive standing next to me.
F: Good. Because I don’t do temporary.

M: Look at me when I warn you.
Obsession isn’t a flaw. It’s focus.
You good? That’s all I care about.
I don’t talk tough. I move.
F: Don’t start what you can’t control.
If I said no, it’s final.
M: I like women who mean it.
You don’t have to repeat yourself.
You don’t have to stress anymore.
You smiling like the villain won.
Should I be jealous of fictional men?
You noticed it too, didn’t you?
